sentences.en: As he wrote, his heart was permeated by a mystical fervour.
sentences.cn: 他写着, 觉得心里充满了神奇的感受.

sentences.en: As his interest mounted in his new life, Chueh - hui's youthful fervour knew no bounds.
sentences.cn: 他对这种新的生活方式的兴趣愈来愈浓,因此在行动上他尽量地表现出来年轻人的热心.

sentences.en: But now this triumph has cooled my fervour.
sentences.cn: 否则,这得意一定将冷淡下我的热情来.

sentences.en: But the motives for Mr Rudd's whale - protection fervour are not wholly pure.
sentences.cn: 不过陆克文先生在保护鲸鱼上的动机可不是那么单纯.

sentences.en: He delivered his speech with evangelical fervour.
sentences.cn: 他发表演说时热烈鼓吹自己的思想。

sentences.en: He supported his local team with a fervour that border on idolatry.
sentences.cn: 他是本地队的球迷,狂热得到了近乎盲目崇拜的程度了.

sentences.en: He took up the cause with evangelical fervour.
sentences.cn: 他以传道者般的热情投身于这一事业.

sentences.en: His eloquence and religious fervour had already given the earnest of high eminence in his profession.
sentences.cn: 他那雄辩的口才和宗教的热情早已预示了他在自己的职业中将要飞黄腾达.

sentences.en: In particular, it inspires an almost religious fervour among its customers.
sentences.cn: 特别引人注意的是, 该公司在用户中激起了一种近乎宗教般的狂热.

sentences.en: She kissed him with unusual fervour.
The fervour of her speech showed she felt strongly.
sentences.cn: 她的话充满热诚,足见她有很深的感受.

sentences.en: The hype and fervour surrounding the event positively invited scepticism.
sentences.cn: 围绕这件事的大肆渲染和热情必然会引起人们的怀疑.

sentences.en: The surroundings helped extinguish any idealistic fervour that might have existed.
sentences.cn: 会议的气氛也彻底浇灭了任何可能存在过的理想主义热情.

sentences.en: They were concerned only with their own religious fervour.
sentences.cn: 他们只在乎自己的宗教信仰。

sentences.en: With almost evangelical fervour, Marks warns against deliberately seeking a tan.
sentences.cn: 几乎是凭着一股疯狂的热情，马克斯警告人们不要刻意追求晒成一身古铜色。
